summary:
I re-made this lady into CHSBHC v3 and ADM  Loshirai14\'s  DeathBell Princess

Hopefully we\'ll be all good with her works, for now.  Sorry for the long \'ol delay.  :[  Le\' ticker is angry.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img834/1296/banner2new.png[/IMG]

1) Endorse the original, because  Loshirai14  said so :D   =  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28788

2) Unfortunately, because of how the esp works out, it\'s self contained.  Sorry. 

3) 1st person should be good to go.  The gauntlets have funny invisible bands at the wrists, invisible bracelets, Feet (I love feet) look really weird on the ring armor.  I don\'t know why  :{

Strange shadow effect on the dresses...tell me if it crashes your game.  I can\'t find it in 3ds max...but it\'s visible in-game.

4) Lots of clipping.  But also WEIGHT SLIDER !!!!  *squee!!!*  XD

5) Also, CHSBv3 and ADM.  WOOT  :>

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img6/5552/install2.png[/IMG]

1) I\'m dead serious, endorse the original.  I effed up Loshirai\'s esp and meshes.
2) Also, self contained.
3) I\'m in for a \"long, dirty talk\" with my ex-princess Deedee  :}    REALLY, endorse Loshirai.  >:|

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/9498/misc2.png[/IMG]

---tell me what to fix!  I\'m relearning!  MOAR CHSB and ADM!!!

[u]Options on tap[/u]:
- ring of armor: DeathBell Princess (whole armor set in ring form)
- seperate enchantable pieces : DeathBell [bra, leggings, anklet, thong, gauntlets, bracelet, necklace, dress, mantle], hat, umbrella.
- further divided into CHSBv3 and ADM.

-  both are craftable and upgradable at the forge and armor table (under jewelry)
- \"help ADM 0\"  \"help CHSB 0\"  \"help deathbell 0\"  in the console  
-  the ring armor (DeathBell Princess) with: NSS = no shoulders, skirt ;  NSD = no shoulders, dress ; NS = no shoulders

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img841/61/endbanner2.png[/IMG]
author: Loshirai14  ozzking
